languages.text: {n}В ответном взгляде Ирлиэт нет злобы — лишь холод и отстраненность. Она более не удостаивает вас ответом, ибо беседы с мон-кай пусты для детей Азуриана.{/n}

{n}There is no spite in the look Yrliet gives you in response — only coldness and detachment. She no longer deigns to answer you, for talking to a mon-keigh is a pointless waste of an Asuryani's time.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}В ответном взгляде Ирлиэт нет злобы — лишь холод и отстраненность. Она более не удостаивает вас ответом, ибо беседы с мон-кай пусты для детей Азуриана.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}There's no spite in the glance Yrliet gives you in response — only coldness and detachment. She no longer deigns to answer you, for talking to a mon-keigh is a pointless waste of an Asuryani's time.{/n}

{n}There is no spite in the look Yrliet gives you in response — only coldness and detachment. She no longer deigns to answer you, for talking to a mon-keigh is a pointless waste of an Asuryani's time.{/n}

languages.text: {n}伊莉耶特看了你一眼，眼神中没有任何怨恨，只有冷漠和疏离。她不再愿意回答你的问题，因为与猴子交谈，不过是在白白浪费她的时间罢了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There is no spite in the look Yrliet gives you in response — only coldness and detachment. She no longer deigns to answer you, for talking to a mon-keigh is a pointless waste of an Asuryani's time.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}伊莉耶特看了你一眼，眼神中没有任何怨恨，只有冷漠和疏离。她不再愿意回答你的问题，因为与猴子交谈，不过是在白白浪费方舟灵族的时间罢了。{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたへの答えとして向けられたユリエットの視線に悪意はない…ただ、冷淡なだけだった。彼女はもう、答える気はないようだった。モン＝ケイと喋るのは無意味で、アシュリヤーニの時間の無駄だった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There is no spite in the look Yrliet gives you in response — only coldness and detachment. She no longer deigns to answer you, for talking to a mon-keigh is a pointless waste of an Asuryani's time.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたへの答えとして向けられたユリエットの視線に悪意はない…ただ、冷淡なだけだった。彼女はもう、答える気はないようだった。モン＝ケイと喋るのは無意味で、アシュリヤーニの時間の無駄だった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}No hay rencor en la mirada de Yrliet, solo frialdad y distanciamiento. Ya no se digna a responderte, pues hablar con {mf|un|una} mon-keigh es una pérdida de tiempo inútil para un Asuryani.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There is no spite in the look Yrliet gives you in response — only coldness and detachment. She no longer deigns to answer you, for talking to a mon-keigh is a pointless waste of an Asuryani's time.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}No hay rencor en la mirada de Yrliet, solo frialdad y distanciamiento. Ya no se digna a responderte, pues hablar con {mf|un|una} mon-keigh es una pérdida de tiempo inútil para un Asuryani.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Es liegt keine Verachtung in dem Blick, mit dem Yrliet dir antwortet — nur Kälte und Distanziertheit. Sie lässt sich nicht mehr dazu herab, dir zu antworten, denn mit einem Chem-Pan-Sey zu sprechen, ist eine sinnlose Vergeudung der Zeit einer Asuryani.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There is no spite in the look Yrliet gives you in response — only coldness and detachment. She no longer deigns to answer you, for talking to a mon-keigh is a pointless waste of an Asuryani's time.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Es liegt keine Verachtung in dem Blick, mit dem Yrliet dir antwortet — nur Kälte und Distanziertheit. Sie lässt sich nicht mehr dazu herab, dir zu antworten, denn mit einem Chem-Pan-Sey zu sprechen, ist eine sinnlose Vergeudung der Zeit einer Asuryani.{/n}

languages.text: {n}D'après le regard froid et détaché qu'Yrliet vous adresse, elle n'est absolument pas touchée par ce que vous dites. Elle ne prend même pas la peine de vous répondre ; une Asuryani n'a pas de temps à perdre à parler à {mf|un|une} mon-keigh.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There is no spite in the look Yrliet gives you in response — only coldness and detachment. She no longer deigns to answer you, for talking to a mon-keigh is a pointless waste of an Asuryani's time.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}D'après le regard froid et détaché qu'Yrliet vous adresse, elle n'est absolument pas touchée par ce que vous dites. Elle ne prend même pas la peine de vous répondre ; une Asuryani n'a pas de temps à perdre à parler à {mf|un|une} mon-keigh.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yrliet'in cevaben attığı bakışta zerre kadar nefret yok. Yalnızca soğukluk ve uzaklık var. Artık seni cevap vermeye değer görmüyor. Bir mon-keighle konuşmak, Asuryani için vakit kaybından ibaret.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There is no spite in the look Yrliet gives you in response — only coldness and detachment. She no longer deigns to answer you, for talking to a mon-keigh is a pointless waste of an Asuryani's time.{/n}
